main event: Several sightings of UFO lights reported by residents in Franklin, Massachusetts, during July and August 1964.
interesting points: A resident claims to have spotted UFOs on multiple occasions over several months,The objects were described as lights that sometimes hovered and sometimes moved rapidly.,The sightings were made by several persons on 12 August 1964, including a police officer verification.,A local television program about UFOs may have prompted increased reports., The official report concluded with the observation being labeled as UNKNOWN.
witness description: local residents and a police officer
